short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes Trello even awesomer by adding optional counts to lists.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds card counts within lists and at the board level. You may exclude an entire list within a board from being counted by adding "nocount" to the list title.
